p: At least this amount of mass was gained in all of the samples. Then we used the magnesium aluminometasilicate, and the essential oil was obtained in higher quantities—from 1.19 ± 0.09 g to 1.57 ± 0.09 g ( p < 0.05). The highest yield of essential oil (HD4, 10.43%) was obtained using 2% magnesium aluminometasilicate ( Figure 2).
